short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that cleans social network websites from unwanted content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are your Facebook feeds getting a little too Elon Musk-y?

We've got the solution for you!

Must Blocker is an app that lets you manage what content you see on your feed, so you can stay focused on what matters (and not get distracted by stuff like Elon Musk).

With Must Blocker, you can keep things clean and tidy, so you can focus on what matters most.
